page.title: 09Home Life
page.content: The life style of most families in the area surveyed has gradually changed in the 1980s. With children and both parents commuting to school and work out of the area, eating hab_ its have altered.{Breakfast:}mainly cereals and toast with fruit juice and coffee.{Midday:}soup and sandwiches. {Main meal:}taken in the evening with the whole family present, but eaten off trays whilst watching television. Fresh fruit and vegetables play an important part of diet, and are either home or locally grown. Most homes have a fridge and freezer making storing of foods easier.{Cooking {facilities}are by solid fuel, elec_ tricity or Calor gas.{Home heating}is gradually changing to central heating using solid fuel, oil or electricity , supplemented by open fires. Most homes have a dog or cat, many have horses.
